description:
CPS Platform can not only print non-replicable 3D label special QR Codes but also realize authentication service in the on-off line which certifies unique identification marking through smartphone and designs payment system (NFC, Bluetooth) and Coin-driven Blockchain Platform Services like AI Blockchain domain service, or Crowd Funding.

Based on the importance of function and efficiency of cryptocurrency, CPS designs the blockchain platform, which is necessary to everyday life. Also, it creates various revenue streams like royalties or technology rental commission fees by providing an authentication service platform. CPS will grow as the global blockchain leader through P2P transaction which is a decentralized function of blockchain, thus popularizing the authentication function of blockchain.
name: Cash Per Scan
